寞寞RS𡖶silent, still, lonely, solitary
  • house 宀 in the darkness 莫: silent and solitary
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 莫 indicates the sound; 宀 (roof) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
寂寞 [ jì mò ]: lonely; lonesome; (of a place) quiet; silent
不甘寂寞 [ bù gān jì mò ]: unwilling to remain lonely or idle; unwilling to be left out
落寞 [ luò mò ]: lonely; desolate

heisig_chinese_memo: Living solitary (alone) can sometimes be as boring as living in a house in a graveyard.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you must not (莫) hide under the roof (宀) just because you're lonely!
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Living solitary (alone) can sometimes be as boring as living in a house in a graveyard.
humanum_full_description_en:
There is no " loneliness " in "Shuowen". The unearthed bamboo slips of the Warring States Period have the form of "宀" and " Mo ". "Shangbo Bamboo Book III. Book of Changes Jan. 45 "Don't be Lonely", the organizer thinks it means loneliness and neglect. One said that it should be read from the Mawangdui silk book and the current edition of Zhouyi as " Mu ", which means covering. (Chen Huiling) " lonely " glyph See also "Guodian Jane. "The Way of Tang Yu", "[宀gua] lonely" refers to Shun's father, the old man.

Documents Handed down " lonely " more with the " silence conjunction." "Lonely" means silence. "Guang Yun. Duo Yun: "Lonely, lonely." Such as "The Songs of Chu." Liu Xiang's "Nine Tans": "The song of the patrol barbarian, the emptiness is lonely." Wang Yi's note: "Lonely, there is no sound." Eastern Jin Xie Daoyun <Mountaineer>: "There is emptiness in the middle of the rock, and loneliness is mysterious. "

"Lonely" also means deserted and lonely. For example, Cao Zhi of the Three Kingdoms "Send Ying's Poem": "Luoyang is so lonely, the palaces are burned." Li Bai of the Tang Dynasty "Jiang Jinjiu": "Sages and sages in ancient times are lonely, only drinkers keep their names."
humanum_short_description_en: "Shuowen" does not have the word " lonely ". The unearthed bamboo slips of the Warring States Period have the form of "宀" and " Mo ". Documents Handed down " lonely " more with the " silence conjunction." "Lonely" means silence
humanum_full_description:
《說文》沒有「寞」字。出土戰國楚簡有從「宀」從「莫」的字形。《上博竹書三．周易》簡45「勿寞」，整理者以為表示寂寞、冷落。一說應從馬王堆帛書本和今本《周易》讀為「幕」，表示遮蓋。（陳惠玲）「寞」的字形又見《郭店簡．唐虞之道》，「[宀瓜]寞」指舜父瞽叟。

　　傳世文獻中「寞」多與「寂」連用。「寂寞」表示寂靜無聲。《廣韻．鐸韻》：「寞，寂寞。」如《楚辭．劉向〈九歎〉》：「巡陸夷之曲衍兮，幽空虛以寂寞。」王逸注：「寂寞，無人聲也。」東晉謝道韞〈登山〉：「巖中間虛宇，寂寞幽以玄。」

　　「寂寞」又表示冷清、孤單。如三國魏曹植〈送應氏詩〉：「洛陽何寂寞，宮室盡燒焚。」唐代李白〈將進酒〉：「古來聖賢皆寂寞，唯有飲者留其名。」
humanum_short_description: 《說文》沒有「寞」字。出土戰國楚簡有從「宀」從「莫」的字形。傳世文獻中「寞」多與「寂」連用。「寂寞」表示寂靜無聲

《說文》沒有「 寞 」字。出土戰國楚簡有從「 宀 」從「 莫 」的字形。《上博竹書三．周易》簡45「勿寞」，整理者以為表示寂寞、冷落。一說應從馬王堆帛書本和今本《周易》讀為「 幕 」，表示遮蓋。（陳惠玲）「 寞 」的字形又見《郭店簡．唐虞之道》，「[宀瓜]寞」指舜父瞽叟。 傳世文獻中「 寞 」多與「 寂 」連用。「寂寞」表示寂靜無聲。《廣韻．鐸韻》：「寞，寂寞。」如《楚辭．劉向〈九歎〉》：「巡陸夷之曲衍兮，幽空虛以寂寞。」王逸注：「寂寞，無人聲也。」東晉謝道韞〈登山〉：「巖中間虛宇，寂寞幽以玄。」 「寂寞」又表示冷清、孤單。如三國魏曹植〈送應氏詩〉：「洛陽何寂寞，宮室盡燒焚。」唐代李白〈將進酒〉：「古來聖賢皆寂寞，唯有飲者留其名。」

Book of Changes Jan. 45 "Don't be Lonely", the organizer thinks it means loneliness and neglect. One said that it should be read from the Mawangdui silk book and the current edition of Zhouyi as " Mu", which means covering. (Chen Huiling) " lonely" glyph See also "Guodian Jane. "The Way of Tang Yu", "[宀gua] lonely" refers to Shun's father, the old man. Documents Handed down " lonely" more with the " silence conjunction." "Lonely" means silence. "Guang Yun. Duo Yun: "Lonely, lonely." Such as "The Songs of Chu." Liu Xiang's "Nine Tans": "The song of the patrol barbarian, the emptiness is lonely." Wang Yi's note: "Lonely, there is no sound." Eastern Jin Xie Daoyun : "There is emptiness in the middle of the rock, and loneliness is mysterious. " "Lonely" also means deserted and lonely. For example, Cao Zhi of the Three Kingdoms "Send Ying's Poem": "Luoyang is so lonely, the palaces are burned." Li Bai of the Tang Dynasty "Jiang Jinjiu": "Sages and sages in ancient times are lonely, only drinkers keep their names."

寞字的基本解释

寞
mò
寂静，清静：寂寞。寞寞。寞然。落寞。冷寞。孤寞。

寞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mò］
［《廣韻》慕各切，入鐸，明。］
亦作“嗼1”。
安静；冷落。见“寞寂”。

寞字的英文翻译

◎ 寞
lonely

寞字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【宀字部】　寞； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页290第15
【廣韻】慕各切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】末各切，?音莫。【說文】寂寞，無聲也。本作嗼，今文作寞。【前漢·揚雄傳】惟寂寞自投閣。【韓愈文】釣於寂寞之濵。　又通作漠。【楚辭·遠遊】野?漠其無人。又【宋玉·九辯】欲?漠而絕端兮。亦借用莫。

寞字的源字形

寞字的起名意思

寂静，清静，无声响。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Yin Ji 1】【Liu Zi Department】　 Lo; Kangxi strokes: 14; Page number: page 290 15
[Guang Yun] Mu Geqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] At the end each cut,? Yin Mo. [Said Wen] Lonely, silent. This is wai, this article is lonely. [Previous Han·Yang Xiong Biography] Only lonely, I voted for it. [Han Yuwen] Fishing for loneliness.　Through the desert again. [Songs of Chu · Yuanyou] Wild? No one is deserted. Also [Song Yu·Nine Debates] Desire? Indifferent and absolute. Also borrowed Mo.

Name meaning
Quiet, quiet, silent.
寞
形声字。一(midn)表意,其古文字形体像房屋,表示屋中寂静无声;莫(mo)表声,莫是暮的初文,表示傍晚到了,屋里
的人都休息了,所以寂静无声。本义是寂静、冷落。
寂静;冷落:寂~|落~。
~然 寂~ 落~
mò
寞
寞
Одинокий, уединенный
Пиктофонетические символы.
Один (midn) означает, что его древние символы напоминают дом, что означает, что в комнате тихо; Mo (mo) означает, что звук, Mo - это первый текст вечера, что означает, что вечер наступил, и люди в комнате отдохнули, поэтому тишина тишина.
Первоначальный смысл - молчание и пренебрежение.
Тихо; холодно и холодно: Ji ~ | fall ~.
~ Ранджи ~ Падение ~
